metadata.Title: CVE-2016-4493 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The demangle_template_value_parm and do_hpacc_template_literal functions incplus-dem.c in libiberty allow remote attackers to cause a denial ofservice (out-of-bounds read and crash) via a crafted binary.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-4493` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

valgrind - 1:3.10.1-1ubuntu3~14.5
No subscription required

gdb - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb-minimal - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb-multiarch - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb-source - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdb64 - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
gdbserver - 7.7.1-0ubuntu5~14.04.3
No subscription required

criterions.comment: valgrind package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:3.10.1-1ubuntu3~14.5').
ht: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
